          <title>
            <string language="en">Electrical appliances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Geräte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appareils électriques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dispositivos elétricos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Apparecchi elettrici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικές συσκευές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicaciones eléctricas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show two examples of electrical appliances having transformers that convert alternating currents into direct currents of the correct voltage for use in their operation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transformers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direct currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical appliances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">personal stereos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">televisions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltages</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen zwei Beispiele der 
elektrischen Geräte, die Transformatoren haben, die Wechselstrom in 
Gleichstrom der korrekten Spannung für Gebrauch in ihrer Operation 
umwandeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent deux exemples des 
appareils électriques ayant des transformateurs qui convertissent les
courants alternatifs en courants continus de la tension correcte pour 
l'usage dans leur exécution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram dois exemplos dos 
dispositivos elétricos que têm os transformadores que convertem 
correntes alternas em correntes diretas da tensão correta para o uso 
em sua operação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano due esempi degli 
apparecchi elettrici che hanno trasformatori che convertono le 
correnti alternate in correnti continue della tensione corretta per 
uso nel loro funzionamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν δύο παραδείγματα των
ηλεκτρικών συσκευών που έχουν τους μετασχηματιστές που 
μετατρέπουν τα εναλλασσόμενα ρεύματα στα άμεσα ρεύματα της 
σωστής τάσης για τη χρήση σε λειτουργία τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran dos ejemplos de las 
aplicaciones eléctricas que tienen transformadores que conviertan 
corrientes alternas en corrientes directas del voltaje correcto para 
el uso en su operación.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
